Sentencas: This work presents the results related to the functionally graded fluorite (F)-perovskite (P) nanocomposite cathodes for IT SOFC.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: Nanocrystalline fluorites (GDC, ScCeSZ) and perovskites (LSrMn, LSrFNi) were synthesized by Pechini method.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: Nanocomposites were prepared by the ultrasonic dispersion of F and P powders in isopropanol with addition of polyvinyl butyral.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: Different techniques for deposition and sintering of functionally graded cathode materials were applied including traditional approaches as well as original methods, such as radiation-thermal sintering under electron beam or microwave radiation.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: Morphology, microstructure and elemental composition of nanocomposites was characterized by XRD and HRTEM/SEM with EDX.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: Even for dense composites, the sizes of perovskite and fluorite domains remain in the nanorange providing developed P-F interfaces.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: Oxygen isotope heteroexchange and conductivity/weight relaxation studies demonstrated that these interfaces provide a path for fast oxygen diffusion.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: The redistribution of the elements between P and F phases in nanocomposites occurs without formation of insulating zirconate phases.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: Button-size fuel cells with nanocomposite functionally graded cathodes, thin YSZ layers and anode Ni/YSZ cermet (either bulk or supported on Ni-Al foam substrates) were manufactured.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures

Sentencas: For optimized composition and functionally graded design of P-F nanocomposite cathodes, a stable performance in the intermediate temperature range with maximum power density up to 0.5 W cm(-2) at 700 degrees C in wet H-2/air feeds was demonstrated.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell composite cathodes based on perovskite and fluorite structures
